scripts.postbuild: node-sass ./src/style/sass/kb-primo-design.scss  ./src/style/primo-design.css && mkdir -p ./dist/css && mkdir -p ./dist/img && cp -R ./src/img/* ./dist/img && mkdir -p ./dist/fonts && cp -R ./src/fonts/* ./dist/fonts && mkdir -p ./dist/html && cp -R ./src/html/* ./dist/html && cat src/style/colors.css src/style/kbdk_styles.css src/style/primo-design.css > ./dist/css/primo-kb-design.css
